title: Bebe Rexha shows off her curves in a figure hugging black leather dress and knee-high boots
text:
She's currently on the road touring with the Jonas Brothers.

But Bebe Rexha made sure to have some fun and dress to impress while at Jewel Nightclub in Las Vegas on Thursday night.

The Meant To Be singer, 30, stunned in a figure hugging black leather dress which emphasised her voluptuous curves.

Stunning: Bebe Rexha, 30, looked sensational in a skin tight black leather dress and red snake skin print boots at Jewel Nightclub in Las Vegas on Thursday night

The musician's statement gown sat off the shoulder and featured a ruffled back, adding to her glamorous look.

The songstress added some colour to her cool ensemble by donning a pair of red snakeskin knee-high boots which had a stiletto heel.

Making sure all eyes were on her outfit, Bebe kept her accessories to a minimum and only wore a pair of large hoop earrings.

The musician added pale eye-shadow and fluttering lashes.

Statement: The singer's statement dress featured a black ruffle and a silver zip down the back

Stylish: Bebe completed her look with a touch of glam make-up and pale pink lipstick

Bebe's sleek blonde tresses stood out against her dark dress and the singer looked radiant as she posed for pictures ahead of the 3rd annual JBL Fest.

Also at the three-day event was NBA All-Star Shaquille O’Neal, also known as DJ Diesel, and Run DMC who performed a throwback set on Caesars Palace's rooftop.

JBL ambassador Priyanka Chopra Jonas, whose husband Nick Jonas Bebe is currently on tour with, was also seen at the party.

Bebe recently slammed designers who only dress stars who are runway size.

She vented in an Instagram video: 'A lot of times artists will go and talk to designers, and they’ll make them custom dresses to walk the red carpet…

Putting on a show: The songstress added some colour to her cool ensemble by donning a pair of red snakeskin knee-high boots which had a stiletto heel

'I had my team hit out a lot of designers, and a lot of them do not want to dress me because I’m too big.

'If a size 6/8 is too big than, I don’t know what to tell you. Then I don’t want to wear your f**king dresses… To all the people that said that I'm thick…f**k you, I don't want to wear your f**king dresses.'

She added: I'm sorry, I had to get this off my chest. If you don’t like my fashion style or my music that’s one thing.

'But don’t say you can’t dress someone that isn’t a runway size. We are beautiful any size! Small or large! Anddddd My size 8 a** is still going to the Grammys.'

Poser: The New York native wore her sleek blonde tresses down and straight for the event
description: The singer, 30, stunned in a skin tight leather dress while at Jewel Nightclub in Las Vegas on Thursday night.
